overview: Kunal Premnarayen is the Group CEO of ICS Group that have with diverse interests in real estate, financial services and hospitality. As a Group CEO, he maps out strategies for the real estate business and plays a leading role in strengthening the foundation of the varied business groups in the organization. His long-term strategies have enabled the organization to attain new business and bolster its growth. He is also actively involved with the asset management segment of the business by working at the strategic level. He completed his graduation (Major in Communications) from the Wake Forest University in North Carolina with his minor subject being International business. He has previously worked with Merrill Lynch, USA and Lucent technologies in Atlanta, USA. His education and working experience in the international backdrop has enabled him to gain invaluable insights about international business and get the grip of their management, operations and working. He is an ardent sportsperson who was ranked among the top tennis players and was a national champion for Maharashtra earlier. Other than tennis, he likes running and playing squash.

external_links.title: Kunal Premnarayen on the Launch of the new JV between the ICS Group and Mantis
